hello: Find it easily in one place
description: Zippling brings together room share and homestay listings from multiple trusted platforms — making your search faster and simpler.
whyZipplingDescription:
Zippling was created based on real experiences of struggling to find housing in Vancouver.
As a developer and as a foreigner myself, I — along with many others — faced difficulties navigating unfamiliar housing systems in a new culture.

When people don't understand each other's norms or ways of communication, a barrier of information naturally arises.
Zippling was born to break down that barrier and help others make better choices with confidence.
